scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Raising of Lazarus. Christ, in a blue robe, stands with his hand raised, facing a tomb from which Lazarus, wrapped in white cloth, is emerging. A crowd of onlookers surrounds Christ, some gesturing or looking on with awe. To the left, a building with arched windows and a dark roof is visible, suggesting an urban or ecclesiastical setting. In the background, a walled city with towers and spires is depicted under a blue sky, with rolling hills and trees.
